text: pāṅchwīṅ sang-e-sulemānī sardonyx. Yānī sang-e-sulemānī kī ek qism jis meṅ nāranjī aur safed aqīq ke parat yake bād dīgare hote haiṅ.  se, chhaṭī aqīq-e-ahmar carnelian  se, sātwīṅ zabarjad peridot  se, āṭhwīṅ āb-e-bahr beryl  se, nawwīṅ pukhrāj topaz  se, daswīṅ aqīq-e-sabz chrysoprase  se, gyārhwīṅ nīle rang ke zarqon Yūnānī lafz kuchh mubham-sā hai.  se aur bārhwīṅ yāqūt-e-arġhawānī amethyst  se.
